title: Advanced app experiences and tools
description: Enhance your apps with new features, such as improved list views, better search experiences, and support for control focus areas.

title: Accessibility improvements
description: Speed up interactions by exposing the most relevant items on a screen in a simple list using the new Rotor API.

title: SwiftUI improvements on macOS
description: New performance and API availability improvements, including support for multicolumn tables, make your macOS apps even better.

title: Always-On Retina Display support
description: On Apple Watch Series 5 and later, the Always-On Retina Display allows watchOS apps to stay visible.
